resources:
MOH bleghhh Home Dashboard Notifications
login/sign up/settings screen<--> Enter Student ID 
(Enter NRIC if staff) Enter Password Enter New Password Enter Name Enter Mentor Group 
(Enter null if staff)
Travel declaration<--> DD/MM/YYYY Enter destination in City, Country format
websites to visit for accurate stuff<-->
